recommended_degree: Sistem Komputer, Ilmu Komputer, Teknik Informatika, Sistem Informasi (Sarjana)
job_description: The intern will support IT projects related to SAP Master Data, Internal Application Services, and Data Integration. Responsibilities include assisting with data preparation, validation, documentation, and coordination with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth data operations. This position is onsite at the Gunung Putri plant.
